name: Roch Guérin
content: Roch Guerin’s webpage - Roch Guerin Roch GuerinHarold B. and Adelaide G. Welge Professor, Washington University in St. Louis Follow St. Louis, MO, U.S.A. Email LinkedIn Github Google Scholar ORCID WikipediaContact InformationPostal addressOther contact infoDept. Comp. Sci. & Eng.Washington University Academic CalendarWashington University in St. Louisphone: (314) 935-6165McKelvey Hall, MSC 1045-213-1010Jemail: LastName@wustl.edu1 Brookings DriveOffice: McKelvey Hall 1010DSaint Louis, MO, USA 63130Office hours: See my course wiki for Fall 2025 hoursWelcome to this webpage. In lieu of introduction, I am the Harold B. and Adelaide G. Welge Professor in the department of Computer Science and Engineering at Washington University in St. Louis (WashU), in addition to currently serving as the chair of the department.You can find a little more about me in the Background section of this website, with information about Current Projects, Publications, recent Talks, and courses I Teach available in the corresponding sections.Thanks and AcknowledgmentsSupport for most of my research projects comes primarily from the National Science Foundation and from industrial partners; most recently Google and in the past companies such as Comcast, Huawei, Siemens, Tellium, Sprint Labs, and Nortel Networks (with the latter three no longer in existence).
